document_data.name: Doriak
document_data.mainbody:
'''Doriak of the Shells''' was a [[dwarf|dwarven]] [[hunter]] operating out of [[Port Nyanzaru]] in [[Chult]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|If you are interested in hunting dangerous beasts, you've come to the right place.|Doriak of the Shells}}
document_data.Activities:
Doriak was a hunter of jungle [[beast]]s, and his favored quarries included [[big claw crab]]s, [[red recluse]] [[spider]]s, and [[giant scorpion|venomtail scorpions]].

He traded bait and lures to hunters who impressed him, such as by bringing him trophies of their hunts.
document_data.Relationships:
Doriak was a member of the [[Hunters' Guild of Chult]], who congregated at [[Hunter's Square]] in Port Nyanzaru.

When [[Volothamp Geddarm]] visited the city in the late 15{{th}} century DR, he became acquainted with Doriak of the Shells.
document_data.History: During the time of the [[death curse]],{{ToA-time}} Doriak was interested in helping other hunters to pursue a number of fearsome creatures, such as the [[manticore]] known as [[Rasalas]], a massive big claw crab known as [[Karkinos]], the [[giant spider]] called [[Chitters]], and the [[fire scorpion]] [[Hedetet]].
